Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 17th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Injured on 4/21/2015 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 7/23/2016...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,064,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,064,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,064,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/27/2022 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
10/20/2022: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $15,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Injured on 4/11/2023 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2023, going 1-0, 0.66...
Traded from Detroit to Boston on 3/2/2024 (Going to DET: SS John Hawkins. Going to BOS: P Nicholas Chidester, CF Bruce Beard)...
Had first career hit on 7/31/2024, off William Ratliff (KC)...
Won World Series with Boston in 2024...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2026, winning 2 games with a 0.69 ERA...
Traded from Boston to St. Louis (C) on 6/20/2026 (Going to BOS: P Douglas Combs, LF Peter Morello, P George Watkins, P Steven Cuyler. Going to STL: P Nicholas Chidester, P Willie Dubois)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2027...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/9/2028 to a 4-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 3/2/2029 (Going to CIN: RF Thomas Shaw, P Nicholas Chidester, P Leigh Gil. Going to BRO: LF Jesse Honeycutt, P Ferdy Desilva, RF Jonathan Muller)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 6/5/2029 (Going to CIN: SS James Haynes. Going to DET: P Nicholas Chidester)...
Injured on 3/21/2030 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 4/8/2030 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/6/2030 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Detroit to Philadelphia on 6/25/2030 (Going to PHI: CF Will Dick, P Nicholas Chidester. Going to DET: 1B Michael Corker, LF Rodolfo Tabares, P Eli Su, P George Telles)...
